observation: COCA Wallet: MPC security meets non-custodial card  top of page Home Product Cards Features Roadmap FAQ Contacts Press Blog More... Use tab to navigate through the menu items. Get Started Discover COCA Wallet's unmatched MPC security and non-custodial debit card. Enjoy best crypto rates, fee-free swaps, easy NFT and dApp access, all with no KYC hassles. COCA Wallet: Watch Video App Store 4.7 Based on 50K reviews Google Play 4.9 User Base 700K Across all platforms Experience bulletproof security with MPC cryptography, eliminating the common vulnerabilities associated with seed phrases and private keys No Seed Phrase Vulnerability Self-custodial freedom with no KYC hassles. Your crypto, your rules. True Ownership, No Red Tape Our advanced routing engine scans, compares, and delivers unbeatable crypto prices, backed by 17 onramps and 182 local payment methods Best Rates Guaranteed Explore and arrange all your NFTs across all Ethereum chains. Every media format, every significant chain, all accessible The Best Way to Unleash the full potential of your funds Sign Up Spending Non-Custodial Physical & Virtual Cards* Whether you prefer Virtual or Plastic cards, our app bestows upon you the pinnacle of convenience and flexibility. Next level of Open Waiting List Virtual Card Step into the modern era of banking with our Virtual Cards. Gain immediate access to a digital version of your card, ideal for online shopping, secure transactions, digital wallet integration, and adept management of your cryptocurrency assets. Physical Card Enjoy the trustworthiness and familiarity of tangible payment cards, now seamlessly harmonized with your crypto holdings. Swipe, insert, or tap your way through smooth transactions at countless locations worldwide. Email * Country Yes, subscribe me to waiting list Subscribe Get your COCA Card! Subscribe now to join the waiting list and secure your spot as one of the first to get your hands on the revolutionary COCA Card! By subscribing, you'll be among the privileged few to experience the future of finance firsthand. Ultimate User Experience Craft multiple wallets and personalize their appearance to suit your style. Your wallet, your way. Tailored Wallet Experience Join Coca Press Releases about COCA Never Lose Your Crypto COCA's 3FA recovery ensures your crypto is always retrievable through your email, 3D FaceLock, and our distinct recovery file Built-in Fraud and Theft Protection With multi-factor authentication, enjoy enhanced security that guards against unauthorized transactions and adds a robust layer of fraud and theft protection Upcoming Improvements Web3 Firewall Real-time, user-friendly alerts defending you from Web3 threats, keeping your crypto journey secure and serene Legacy Transfer Effortlessly pass on your digital legacy. Secure, simple asset transfer to your loved ones, ensuring your crypto lives on * The COCA Wallet's Virtual and Physical Cards and its features are provided in cooperation with its partner licensed e-money institutions in the UK and EU ** Your crypto will be automatically converted to fiat at the time purchase. ​ What is unique about COCA Wallet's security features? COCA Wallet employs Multi-Party Computation (MPC) cryptography which eliminates common vulnerabilities associated with seed phrases and private keys. This ensures your wallet is always recoverable and never hacked, providing a level of security that is unparalleled in the industry. How does the Non-Custodial Debit & Virtual Card work? COCA Wallet offers both physical and virtual cards allowing you to spend your stablecoins and cryptocurrency at over 40 million merchants across 200+ countries. The non-custodial nature ensures that you have zero third-party risks and complete control over your funds at all times. How does COCA Wallet guarantee the best rates? Our advanced routing engine scans, compares, and delivers unbeatable crypto prices by leveraging 17 onramps and 182 local payment methods. This ensures you always get the best rates when trading or converting your cryptocurrency. What are No Fee Ultimate Swaps? COCA Wallet allows you to engage in cross-chain swaps with a vast liquidity pool without any fees. Moreover, it provides Flashbots protection against sandwich attacks and Miner Extractable Value (MEV), ensuring you get the best price with no hidden charges. How can I manage my NFTs with COCA Wallet? COCA Wallet provides a seamless platform to explore, arrange, and manage your NFTs across all Ethereum chains. Every media format on every significant chain is accessible, making it a one-stop solution for your NFT collection. What does dApp Discovery at Ease mean? With our built-in dApp browser, you can access and interact with a myriad of DeFi protocols seamlessly without ever leaving your wallet. This feature enhances your ability to discover and use decentralized applications with ease. What is meant by True Ownership, No Red Tape? COCA Wallet promotes self-custodial freedom, meaning you have complete control over your crypto assets without any KYC (Know Your Customer) hassles. Your crypto, your rules. Are COCA Wallet's Virtual and Physical Cards available worldwide? Currently, our Virtual and Physical Cards are available in the UK and EEA, with plans to expand to additional regions soon. You can check the available regions You Asked, We Answered Join our 700K user community today Need Help? Join our Discord channel! thought: The website does not exhibit any characteristics of a scam website. The content is focused on promoting a digital wallet and virtual/physical cards for managing cryptocurrency. There are no unusually low prices, claims of free money, or targeting of psychological weaknesses. The website also provides clear information about their product and has appropriate contact information. The content seems to be updated and the payment methods are related to cryptocurrency. Based on this analysis, the website does not appear to be a scam. {
